original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato channassa upaṭṭhāko mahāmatto āyasmato channassa vihāraṁ kārāpeti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmataḥ channassa upaṭṭhākaḥ mahāmattaḥ āyasmataḥ channassa vihāram kārāpeti

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpeti, punappunaṁ lepāpeti.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channo kata pariyositam vihāram punappunam chādāpeti punappunam lepāpeti

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca saṅkaḍḍhanto aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa yavakhettaṁ dūsesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channo tiṇam ca kaṭṭham ca saṅkaḍḍhantaḥ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa yava khettam dūsesi

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāca iti
katham hi nāma bhadantāḥ amhākam yava khettam dūsessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpessati, punappunaṁ lepāpessati, atibhārito vihāro paripatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā channo kata pariyositam vihāram punappunam chādāpessati punappunam lepāpessati ati bhāritaḥ vihāro paripati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam channam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpesi, punappunaṁ lepāpesi, atibhārito vihāro paripatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva channa kata pariyositam vihāram punappunam chādāpesi punappunam lepāpesi ati bhāritaḥ vihāro paripati iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpessasi, punappunaṁ lepāpessasi, atibhārito vihāro paripati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa kata pariyositam vihāram punappunam chādāpessasi punappunam lepāpessasi ati bhāritaḥ vihāraḥ paripati
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Mahallakaṁ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṁ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya
analyzed: mahallakam pana bhikkhunā vihāram kārayamānena yāva dvāra kosāḥ aggaḷa ṭṭhapanāya āloka sandhi parikammāya

original: dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṁ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari appaharitepi
analyzed: pariyāyam appaharite ṭhitena tato ce uttari appaharite pi

original: ullitto vā hoti avalitto vā ullittāvalitto vā.
analyzed: ullittaḥ vā hoti avalittaḥ vā ullitta avalittaḥ vā

original: vātapānaparikammāya setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ.
analyzed: vāta pāna parikammāya seta vaṇṇam kāḷa vaṇṇam geruka parikammam mālā kammam latā kammam makara dantakam pañca paṭika

original: Sace harite ṭhito adhiṭṭhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: sace harite ṭhitaḥ adhiṭṭhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Maggena chādentassa dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṁ maggaṁ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: maggena chādentassa dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyam maggaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba

original: Pariyāyena chādentassa dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṁ pariyāyaṁ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: pariyāyena chādentassa dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyam pariyāyam āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba

original: Tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyyāti
analyzed: tato ce uttari appaharite pi ṭhitaḥ adhiṭṭhaheyya ati

original: Silāya chādentassa silāya silāya āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: silāya chādentassa silāya silāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Sudhāya chādentassa piṇḍe piṇḍe āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sudhāya chādentassa piṇḍe piṇḍe āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Tiṇena chādentassa karaḷe karaḷe āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: tiṇena chādentassa karaḷe karaḷe āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Paṇṇena chādentassa paṇṇe paṇṇe āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: paṇṇena chādentassa paṇṇe paṇṇe āpatti pācittiyassa
atireka dvatti pariyāye atireka saññī adhiṭṭhāti āpatti pācittiyassa
atireka dvatti pariyāye vematikaḥ adhiṭṭhāti āpatti pācittiyassa
atireka dvatti pariyāye ūnaka saññī adhiṭṭhāti āpatti pācittiyassa
ūnaka dvatti pariyāye atireka saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
ūnaka dvatti pariyāye vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa
ūnaka dvatti pariyāye ūnaka saññī anāpatti
